content.rendered:
Not many weeks after the launch of the Huracan Spyder & Huracan Avio, Prestige Motorcars launches the newest member of the Huracan family. The Huracan Performante Spyder.

A selected few media outlets were invited to participate in this event, as it was strictly for press conference purposes. 

This is an impressive machine to say the least, with 640 bhp and 600 Nm torque, this car is capable of going from 0 – 100 kmh in just 3.1 seconds and has a top speed of 325 kmh. All this with the option of having the top down. And with only 2 units in Indonesia, it makes this the center of attention at car events.
